definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: We need messiahs. The Second Comingevent is Messianic!
sentences.chinese: 耶稣再临事件是弥赛亚的。

sentences.english: Now that the Second Coming event is so close, it is time to come out of disguise.
sentences.chinese: 现在耶稣再临事件很近了，是时候显露真身了。

sentences.english: A storm is only as the outskirts of His robe, the symptom of His advent, the environment of His presence.
sentences.chinese: 风浪是神义袍的边襟，再临的征候，同在的证据。

definition: lit. to descend to earth (of an immortal)/to be born
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
to arise again/to make a comeback/resurgence
to pursue deer/fig. to vie for supremacy
lit. to reverse the rotation of the sky/fig. to reverse a desperate situation
